seo.title: CloudDrop - Secure P2P File Sharing
seo.description: CloudDrop - Secure peer-to-peer file sharing, no installation needed, end-to-end encrypted, cross-device transfer
seo.ogDescription: Secure peer-to-peer file sharing tool, no installation needed, end-to-end encrypted, instant cross-device transfer

common.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to perform this action?

emptyState.title: Waiting for Devices
emptyState.description: Let other devices join using the same room code to discover each other and transfer files
emptyState.hint: When using across devices, share the room code to ensure all devices join the same room

security.title: Security First, Privacy Guaranteed
security.subtitle: We use industry-leading security technology to ensure your file transfers are safe and reliable

endToEndEncryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
endToEndEncryption.desc: Using AES-256-GCM encryption, files are encrypted before transmission, only the recipient can decrypt
endToEndEncryption.tooltip: Using AES-256-GCM encryption algorithm, files are encrypted before transmission, only the recipient can decrypt them, even if data is intercepted it cannot be read

noServerStorage.title: No Server Storage
noServerStorage.desc: Files are not stored on any server, destroyed immediately after transfer, leaving no trace
noServerStorage.tooltip: Files are not stored on any server, data is transferred directly between devices, automatically destroyed after transfer, leaving no trace

p2pDirect.title: P2P Direct Transfer
p2pDirect.desc: Prioritizes WebRTC technology for peer-to-peer direct connection, faster and more private
p2pDirect.tooltip: Prioritizes WebRTC technology for peer-to-peer direct connection between devices, no relay server needed, faster transfer, lower latency, better privacy

openSource.title: Open Source & Transparent
openSource.desc: Fully open-source code, subject to community review, security proven
openSource.tooltip: Complete source code open on GitHub, reviewed by global developers and security experts, security proven through transparency

modes.label: Transfer Mode
modes.p2pTooltip: Direct peer-to-peer connection between devices, no server relay needed, faster and lower latency
modes.relayTooltip: Transferred via server relay, data is still end-to-end encrypted for secure transmission

connection.slow: Network is slow, trying relay transfer...
connection.failedSwitchRelay: Connection failed, switched to relay transfer
connection.switchedToRelay: Switched to relay transfer for stable connection
connection.timeoutSwitchRelay: Connection timeout, switched to relay transfer

fileRequest.title: File Received
fileRequest.securityNotice: File encrypted in transit, secure and reliable
fileRequest.alwaysAccept: Always accept files from this device
fileRequest.trustHint: Once trusted, files from this device will be automatically accepted

deviceName.description: Set a friendly name for easier identification by other devices

room.joinDesc: Enter room code to join the room where other devices are
room.passwordRequired: This room requires a password to join
room.invalidCode: Invalid room code format (requires 6 alphanumeric characters)
room.createSecureDesc: Create an encrypted room, only users with the password can join
room.autoAssigned: Joined room {{room}}, share the room code with other devices

share.title: Share Room
share.qrHint: Scan QR code to join room
share.hint: Let other devices join this room code to transfer files

chat.title: Message History

emptyState.hint: Send your first message or image below

chat.copyNotSupported: Your browser doesn't support copying images, please right-click to copy manually

toast.fileTimeout: File request timed out, no response from recipient
toast.selectDevice: Please click on the target device to send file
toast.selectDeviceForText: Please click on the message button of the target device to send text

settings.title: Settings
settings.trustedDevicesHint: Files from trusted devices will be automatically accepted
settings.confirmUntrust:
Are you sure you want to untrust "{{name}}"?

After untrusting, files from this device will require manual confirmation.

quickActions.title: Send to...
quickActions.sendFileDesc: Select file to send to device
